summary: Adds the \"Archmage\'s Boots\", they have a weaker version of the enchantment found on the archmages robes.  The boots can be crafted at any forge.
descriptionHtml:
+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim

Archmage\'s Boots
+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++


Description
+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
This mod adds, none other than, Archmage\'s Boots. The boots have a weaker version of the enchantment found on the archmage\'s robes.
Specifically, -10% cost to all magic schools and +10% resist magic.
Craftable at any forge.  The recipe can be found in the MISC section.


Version 1.1.1----------------------
    Must be Archmage to craft the boots in this version. 


Version 1.1----------------------
    Added Thalmor, Nightingale, Psiijic and Shrouded variants of the boots.
    No longer need to be Archmage to craft the boots.


Installation
+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
To install, extract \"Archmage\'s Boots.esp\" to your \"Skyrim/Data\" directory.
To uninstall, delete \"Archmage\'s Boots.esp\" from your \"Skyrim/Data\" directory.


Recipe
+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
In order to craft these boots, just bring the following items to your nearest forge.
[v1.1.1] - You must be Arcmage before the recipes will appear at the forge.

Items needed:
	1 Wisp Wrapping
	1 Leather
	2 Leather Strips
	1 Grand Soul Gem (filled with 1 grand soul)

Where to craft:
	Any forge.


Notes
+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
Playing as a pure cloth caster I feel there just aren\'t any good enchantments for your boots.
Sure you could roll with the rest and enchant with frost/fire resistance for the pesky dragons, but let\'s be different shall we? ^_^

This mod should not offer any compatability issues but please let me know if you find anything... awry.
Without the CK at this time the boots will only be listed in english. Will likely update once the CK is released.

Any and all feedback is welcome and please endorse if you enjoy this mod, thanks. ^_^


Credits
+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
I would like to thank Samutz for his awesome tutorial that can be found at http://www.skyrimforge.com/forums/skyrimmodding/moddingtutorials/28901-tutorial-making-new-smithing-recipes-pre-ck/.
A huge thank you to Bethesda for yet another amazing TES game.
Another thanks goes out to kab for his work on Archmage Crafting - http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2092

And thank YOU for checking out my mod.
author: Smobutter

files.name: Archmages Boots v1_1 No Requirements

No longer need to be Archmage to craft the boots.
